author: ekoneil
msg: This test ensures that the JavaBean model objects dropped into the JspContext are present and missing at the correct times.
This is done through an "assert" .tag file which throws a JspException when the given test condition is violated .

msg: Sync with 2.2: Added support for stripping root elements in the CIncludeTransformer.
